text: Offensive linemen (also OL) are American football players who defend the quarterback or running backs by blocking defensive players. == Details == OL are separated from 4 positions. *Center (C) (1) *Guard (G) (2) *Tackle (T) (2) *Tight end (E) (0~2) == Rules == *OL (without C) must not touch a ball. *Do not grab defensive players from behind. *In pass play, don't cross the line of scrimmage. *OL must wear uniform which the number is 50 to 79. == References == *NFL web cite *Football Fanatics(Football shop) Category:American football positions
title: Offensive linemen
